name: Smashing Tail
summary: You have a tail that serves as a potent weapon.
description:
You have a tail that serves as a potent weapon. You gain a tail unarmed attack that deals 1d6 bludgeoning damage, has the sweep trait, and is in the brawling weapon group.Traits

Ganzi: A planar scion descended from a chaotic being of the Maelstrom, such as a protean
